title: Ghana Not Debt Distressed....We're Rather Making Economic Gains - Prez Mahama
text: President John Mahama has dismissed suggestions that Ghana is highly indebted, explaining a misunderstanding of an agreement with the IMF had led to that erroneous idea. â€œWe have a debt ceiling with the IMF and it was mistaken to mean that
